summary: A U.S. Government memorandum dated July 24, 2019, directing the removal of inmate Jeffrey Epstein from suicide watch and his placement on psychological observation. This document is significant as it relates to the circumstances surrounding Epstein's custody shortly before his death.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate referenced in the memorandum who is to be removed from suicide watch and placed on psychological observation.

events.title: Epstein Removed from Suicide Watch
events.description: A memorandum is issued directing the removal of inmate Jeffrey Epstein from suicide watch and his placement on psychological observation.

keyFacts: The document is a U.S. Government memorandum dated July 24, 2019.
It orders the removal of inmate Jeffrey Epstein (ID #76318-054) from suicide watch.
It orders that Epstein be placed on psychological observation instead.
This action occurred approximately two weeks before Epstein's death on August 10, 2019.
